name: Team ;: Pet Pal
description:
Pet Pal is an incremental game which is cute and humourous. The more you love your pet pal sheep, the more he'll love you back! Eventually he will even evolve out of love for you, his wonderful owner.

Controls: To play Pet Pal,  you only need to use your mouse to tap on the sheep to give them love and to buy upgrades for your love in the shop window on the left.

Amy Elliott - Programming, Project Management, Video work
Jacob Kelly- UI art, Concept art, Video work
Layla McCahon - Programming
Fabio Pereira - UI logic, Shop mechanics
Lewis Roberts - Digital artwork, concept art.
